about_the_game:
Overview


2D style shoot'em up in which close combat is the primary attack method.

With two large swords in her hands,
cut her way through enemy bullets and enemy units
in a post-apocalyptic world.

PreStory


She has lost her precious memory.

She is heading to the facility where all the records are stored.

She seeks that precious memory ......
Whatever the cost......

Circumstances



The robots guarding the facility [Canaria]
were scheduled to perform a "military exercise in preparation
for an attack on the facility by a foreign enemy".


The robots were divided into two groups
,the attackers and the defenders,
and they conducted military exercises
and collected the data obtained from the exercises.


The matrix AI would build more advanced robots
and the operational AI would formulate more advanced strategies.


The each of the attackers and defenders
developed on their own.






...How many exercises did it take
for an exercise to become so fierce
that it could no longer be called a exercise?

Main Character



  • Appearance

    Her appearance can only be described as a humanoid robot,
    but it is unclear whether she is a robot from the start
    or a human who received cyborgisation surgery
    in order to adapt to the harsh environment,
    as seen in [the unchosen humans] after [Jocelyn].

    To assume that she was a robot from the start,
    she has some aspects that would not lead you to believe that she was a robot,
    and to assume that she was originally human,
    she has some aspects that would not lead you to believe that she was human.


    It is considered to be a female or female-typed robot
    due to its female-like facial features.


    Her entire body is made up of parts that are clearly mismatched (mainly for weapons equipment),
    so it is thought that a number of combat-use cyborgisation surgeries have been carried out.


    She is missing parts of her memory
    and is not sure whether the name Penryn is her real name.
    She uses this name [Penryn] because she barely remembers
    "being taught to call herself [Penryn] that for convenience".
    Due to this lack of memory,
    it is also unclear whether she is a robot or
    a human being who has undergone cyborgisation surgery.


    Her hair is silver in color,
    but this is thought to be a result of decolourisation of the blonde hair.
    In fact, blonde hair is also found on the inner hair of the head,
    which is less affected by the outside world.


    She wears a green shirt jacket and a navy blue skirt.
    These are thought to be linked to her identity, but details are unknown.
    It is thought that these may relate to missing memories.




  • Weapons
    She uses modified weapons
    from [comedians] who have been shot down in past military exercises.


    One particular weapon is the large sword held in both her hands,
    which can neutralise [Comedian]'s energy weapon and barrier,
    and converts them into energy material.


    She uses these two large swords as a way of either attacking or defending.

    She easily swings two large swords single-handedly,
    which are not appropriate for her body size,
    and the fact that she does not even lose her balance is thought to be
    a result of combat-use cyborgification.


  • Origin

    Unknown.


  • miscellaneous

    Height: 152.2 cm
    Weight: 158 kg

Features


  • Game is made up of total of 5+α levels.
  • Genre is shoot'em up, but the combat style is mainly close combat with large sword slashes.
  • Stage-clear style that makes it easy to try again even if you fail.
  • An adventurous story is unlocked as you progress stages.
  • 'HOW TO PLAY' which is a basic operation guide.
    'PRACTICE ROOM' where the player can freely control their character.

name: ADDRESS1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-2400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 2000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound Chip (Sound cards supporting DirectSound)
  • Additional Notes: This is the lowest spec environment I've tested. PS: I don't know how to determine the minimum environment...
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
